General.Name: Grape King Bio Ltd
General.Description: Grape King Bio Ltd produces and sells pharmaceutical preparations, patent medicines, liquid tonics, drinks, and healthy foods in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distribution, and Original Design Manufacturer/Original Equipment Manufacturer segments. The company provides kampo maintenance, health regulation, female beauty, school-age health care, and energy drink products, as well as food inspection services. Grape King Bio Ltd was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
